mapper.sql: a.chinese AS "chinese", a.english AS "english", a.japanese AS "japanese", a.mobile_prefix AS "mobilePrefix"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dm_country a
1=1
AND a.area LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' '%'+#{area}+'%' concat('%',#{area},'%')
AND a.mobile_prefix LIKE '%'||#{mobilePrefix}||'%' '%'+#{mobilePrefix}+'%' concat('%',#{mobilePrefix},'%')
AND a.initial LIKE '%'||#{initial}||'%' '%'+#{initial}+'%' concat('%',#{initial},'%')
order by a.initial
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
